## Protocol.Page.SetDeviceMetricsOverrideRequest.mobile property

Whether to emulate mobile device. This includes viewport meta tag, overlay scrollbars, text autosizing and more.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mobile: boolean;
```
